*Blizzard sighs and exits the base. Twister storms into the back of the bas=
e*
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: THECODE 
  To: nbwrpg@...=
m 
  Sent: Sunday, July 16, 2000 4:41 PM
  Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


  =
Note, just drop Sinesis and Sinister in the CR Chamber before they're dead!=
 Why would you need parts?...
    ----- Original Message ----- 
    From: i=
lovealllizards 
    To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
    Sent: Sunday, July 16, 2000=
 5:12 AM
    Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


    *Blizzard walks into the Pre=
d base while holding Sinesis. Twister follows* *Blizzard sits Sinesis down =
and sighs* Blizzard: I think were going to need anlot of parts. *Blizzard o=
nce again sighs*
      ----- Original Message ----- 
      From: THECODE 
 =
     To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
      Sent: Sunday, July 16, 2000 5:03 AM
    =
  Subject: Neo Beast Wars


      Dracona walks up to the Predacon (Megatro=
n's) base and looks at it. It didn't notice her, so she went closer and ins=
pected it. She looked around it, making notes of certain things.

      Pli=
ntissa followed Artist out in the missle of no where in a desert. Artist tu=
rned around and looked at Plintissa.

      "Plintissa now see Artist's sec=
ret treasure!" Artist said. He smiled. Plintissa was stunned. Artist dug a =
little in the sand, and brought up a hermit crab shell. Artist laughed and =
ran off laughing giddily. Plintissa sighed and turned back. No wait, maybe =
this way was back. No wait, that way. Plintissa realized she was lost, and =
that Artist was nowhere to be found. She looked around from left to right. =
Oh, what was the use, she might as well be dead out on the desert anyhow, s=
he obviously wasn't needed, not even Dracona stuck around with her! She had=
 thought that Iron Raptor was her friend, but that blew up in her face. The=
n she made the mistake of trusting some bot sho said he would help her, and=
 then she went off and nobody trusted her any longer. Plintissa walked off =
into the distance, hoping to find her way home. Then it occured to her. She=
 didn't have a home. a single tear fell from Plintissa's eye and she walked=
 on.

      Artist ran off into the distance and looked back joyfully. Plin=
tissa wasn't there.

      "Yikes! I was supposed to protect her!" Artist s=
aid. He ran back into the desert, darting quickly mile for mile, trying to =
find Plintissa.

      Gangon's spark glowed eerily and bumped into BrightB=
lade's hand.

      Sinesis and Sinister lay there, half dead with Sinister=
 in pieces.

      Deemos figures out that this disgusting team must not be=
 right for him and he runs off, hoping maybe the Maximals would be good eno=
ugh to let him and his wife join and heal up. He ran along, going quickly, =
about 2 hours later he found the Maximal base. Inzola was in his arms in st=
asis lock and spitting out blood, she was bleeding internally. Deemos whimp=
ered and aproached the Maximal base.

      "Attention! Maximals! I wish to=
 join you, as does my wife and cohort, Inzola! Let me it, Inzola is in crit=
ical condition!" Deemos said.

      The Radicons ceased their walk and sat=
 down in a forest. Airbomber sighed.

      "Food would be good about now."=
 Train Wreck said. Arrow smiled.

      "Wait here, I'll go get something!"=
 Arrow said. He went running off. Blender and Stronghold shrugged, Strongho=
ld staring into the distance and Blender scanning the area. Stranato and Tr=
ain Wreck look at each other and gulp. Arrow must be their chef now.

     =
 "I hope you like what Arrow makes." Airbomber said to Infectra. (If she's =
there.)

------------------------------------------------------------------=
------------

-------------------
